short_summary: R&E of material handling machinery and equipment
description: The purchase of Material Handling Equipment including the storage of goods and services.
full_summary:
# Repair and Overhaul of Material Handling Equipment (MHE)
## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-228609/A
* **Title**: Repair and Overhaul of Material Handling Equipment (MHE)
* **Publication Date**: June 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 4, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: October 31, 2028

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements**: Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents

## Tender Information

* **Tender Description**: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for Repair and Overhaul (R&O), Field Service Representatives (FSR), and Technical Support to perform inspection, repair, and maintain Material Handling Equipment (MHE) and its components.
* **Statement of Work**: The work under this requirement will be carried out for a period of three (3) years from the effective date of the contract with an option to extend the contract for two (2) additional periods of one (1) year.
* **Submission Requirements**: Bids must be submitted by e-mail only to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca)

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Officer**: Hector Vargas
* **Email**: [HECTOR.VARGAS@forces.gc.ca](mailto:HECTOR.VARGAS@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (000) 000-0000

## Tender Documents

* You can download the tender documents here: 
  * English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6349/w8486-228609_ro_militarized_mhe_fleet___rfp_%28english.pdf
  * French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6349/w8486-228609_ro_militarized_mhe_fleet__rfp_%28french.pdf
